subject: Football
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots defensive back Willie Andrews was held without bail after being accused of pointing a handgun at his girlfriend’s head. Andrews, 24, was arrested after an incident that occurred about 1 a.m. Monday, after he returned home and had an argument with his girlfriend, according to Gregg Miliote, director of communications for the Bristol County (Mass.) district attorney’s office. Andrews is being held pending a hearing on Thursday.
